API_Description: Navigates to a specified page in the PDF document.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'gotoPage' suggests functionality related to navigating or moving to a specific page within the document.
Returns_Reason: The method is likely intended to perform an action (navigating to a page) without returning any value, as is common with navigation methods.

nPageNum.description: The 0-based index of the page to navigate to.
nPageNum.description_reason: Navigation methods typically require a page number or index to specify the destination page.
nPageNum.type_reason: Page numbers or indices are usually represented as numbers, especially when referring to a specific position in a sequence.
